questions.question: Which of these is NOT considered a type of AI?

What's the main goal of computer vision?
options: To enable computers to identify and process images
questions.correct_answer: To enable computers to identify and process images

questions.question: Which technology helps virtual assistants like Siri understand what you're saying?
What is 'machine learning'?
options: When computers learn from data without explicit programming
A way to repair computers automatically
questions.correct_answer: When computers learn from data without explicit programming
